data.title: Hanover Capital Campaign — Visions for Creative Housing Solutions
data.text:
Hanover Capital Campaign

On March 1st, 2023, we officially launched our campaign to fund the development of a third Visions location, in the heart of Hanover, NH. We are so very grateful for the many committed donors who are supporting this critical project!

we are profoundly grateful for the generosity

of all our donors

THANK YOU!

New Hampshire Department of Business and Economic Affairs (Invest NH)

Federal Home Loan Bank of Boston

Mascoma Bank

NH Community Development Finance Authority (CDFA)
